name: Banded Archerfish
description: It usually has a silvery coloration with transverse black stripes. Its head is characteristically pointed with an upward-facing mouth.
spread_note: India, Southeast Asia, Australia, New Guinea, Oceania, Philippines
image_alt: Banded Archerfish, photo: Tereza Mrhálková, Prague Zoo
reproduction: Does not care for its eggs.
attractions: It stays near the water surface, watching with large eyes for insects landing on protruding plant parts.
